items.name: CE-64 Grenadier
items.description: The set's classic advertising campaign 'Have you tried a grenade?' has remained unchanged for over 70 years

passive.name: Engineering Kit
passive.description:
Further Reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. 
 Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of grenades by +2.

items.name: CW-9 White Wolf
items.description: The pattern used for this armor is the result of the Winter Camouflage Improvement Effort, which considered 136 entrants before determining the color white would best blend in with snow.
